image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
image.name: J000306_001

profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Nyack, Rockland County, N.Y., May 18, 1987; graduated from Spring Valley High School, Spring Valley, N.Y., 2005; B.A., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif., 2009; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2013; staff, United States Department of Justice, 2009–2010; lawyer, private practice; Westchester County, N.Y., attorney, 2018-2019; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-January 3, 2023); unsuccessful candidate for renomination to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress in 2024.

asset.name: J000306_001
